actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Subcommittee on Financial Institutions. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 99-575.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to impose a national ceiling on credit card interest rates.
short_title: National Credit Card Consumer Protection Act

summary.text: National Credit Card Consumer Protection Act - Amends the Truth in Lending Act to establish a national ceiling on credit card interest rates.

titles.title: National Credit Card Consumer Protection Act
A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to impose a national ceiling on credit card interest rates.
